General.Name: Xiamen King Long Motor Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen King Long Motor Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, and sale of bus products in China and internationally. Its products include large, medium, and light passenger buses primarily used in tourism, highway, and bus passenger transportation; group transportation; school buses; special passenger vehicles; and other industries. The company also manufactures and sells passenger cars. Xiamen King Long Motor Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Xiamen, China.
